div.class: kl-title-block clearfix tbk--text-light tbk--center text-center tbk-symbol-- tbk-icon-pos--after-title eluide82ea897

div.div: Despite all sanctions, none of our Presses stopped for lack of Spare Parts delivery delay. We're happy with NOORTEC SERVICE.
Fast and efficient SUPPORT from NOORTEC is one of the greatest factors of our success.
We're satisfied with comprehensive and professional COOPERATION of NOORTEC company.

The next generation in half format With the Rapida 75 PRO, KBA is proud to present the latest generation of presses for half-format sheetfed offset. The new press is based on the proven mechanical platform of the predecessor series. The control concept is identical to that of all other Rapida models. Accordingly, the Rapida 75 PRO lends a further boost to operator convenience and offers a number of additional functions.
